name: Music Blade
description:
Welcome to the Beat Music Blade: EDM Rhythm Sword the new music rhythm game. Beat Blade! Featuring a distinctive soundtrack EDM, and design, each level is a unique musical journey and challenge!

Music Blade is an exciting music runner game that offers stunning neon levels and new trend music hit songs. Where you turn yourself into such cool Beat Saber Heroes to complete the most challenging journey !

Simply using one thumb to control the character, you can slash the blocks and dodge the traps, reaching the end of the color road.

To anticipate what’s coming next and be able to react to its twist and turns you have to listen carefully to the music. The rhythm of the melody is key to everything that happens in the game.

How to play:
- Tiles fall with Beat EDM Rhythm Music.
- Hold and drag to move your Beat Saber Blade character and slash the dot blocks on the bea
- Try not to miss any tiles to keep the game going.
- Enjoy addictive challenges and EDM beats designed for each song.
- Collect coins and gems to unlock new music content.

Try Music Blade: EDM Rhythm Sword now! Music lovers will definitely love it!
